description: Stayed at a summer residence on Mount Olivet, overlooking the Kedron, surrounded by hills abundant in grapes, pomegranates, almonds, apricots, and figs.

place: Village at the top of the mountain
description: Visited the village for the reception of the Pacha and his Hareem, and engaged in exchanges with the local villagers.
Observed village maidens at the well near the camping ground, reflecting on the traditional role of women in water collection.

place: Pathway from the city to Jordan
description: Visited and reflected upon the historical significance of the pathway leading from the city to Jordan, by way of Bahurim.
